page.title: 18EDUCATION II
page.content:
The extension includes,boys toilets, girls toilets,and the kitchen.The extension is much more modern,and is made of brick and has been pebble-dashed .
SECONDARY EDUCATION
Our secondary education is in Annan, four miles from here . When pupils of Cummertrees are 12, they move to Annan Academy,the only secondary school in this district. The pupils would get to school by service bus,or a school bus. There are in between 11OO and 12OO pupils in Annan Academy.Annan Academy is quite modern,with five storey block buildings.
